message: I follow the main street like Clear's map says.
Something familiar catches my eye, so I turn around to see what it was.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm? Nothing. I just thought I saw Clear."
That slouch and messy hair... Who else could it be?
But when I turned to look, he was already gone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Couldn't be. It must've been someone who looks like him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. That's why I said it couldn't be."
I screw my head back on and head for the tower.
